methods.boolean equals(Object o): Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.
methods.boolean getBoolean(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a boolean or can be coerced to a boolean.
methods.double getDouble(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a double or can be coerced to a double.
methods.int getInt(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is an int or can be coerced to an int.
methods.JSONArray getJSONArray(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a JSONArray.
methods.JSONObject getJSONObject(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a JSONObject.
methods.long getLong(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a long or can be coerced to a long.
methods.String getString(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists, coercing it if necessary.
methods.int hashCode(): Returns a hash code value for the object.
methods.boolean isNull(int index): Returns true if this array has no value at index, or if its value is the null reference or JSONObject#NULL.
methods.String join(String separator): Returns a new string by alternating this array's values with separator.
methods.int length(): Returns the number of values in this array.
methods.Object opt(int index): Returns the value at index, or null if the array has no value at index.
methods.boolean optBoolean(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a boolean or can be coerced to a boolean.
methods.boolean optBoolean(int index, boolean fa: Returns the value at index if it exists and is a boolean or can be coerced to a boolean.
methods.double optDouble(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a double or can be coerced to a double.
methods.double optDouble(int index, double fallb: Returns the value at index if it exists and is a double or can be coerced to a double.
methods.int optInt(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is an int or can be coerced to an int.
methods.int optInt(int index, int fallback): Returns the value at index if it exists and is an int or can be coerced to an int.
methods.JSONArray optJSONArray(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a JSONArray.
methods.JSONObject optJSONObject(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a JSONObject.
methods.long optLong(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a long or can be coerced to a long.
methods.long optLong(int index, long fallback): Returns the value at index if it exists and is a long or can be coerced to a long.
methods.String optString(int index): Returns the value at index if it exists, coercing it if necessary.
methods.String optString(int index, String fallb: Returns the value at index if it exists, coercing it if necessary.
methods.JSONArray put(int value): Appends value to the end of this array.
methods.JSONArray put(long value): Appends value to the end of this array.
methods.JSONArray put(int index, boolean value): Sets the value at index to value, null padding this array to the required length if necessary.
methods.JSONArray put(double value): Appends value to the end of this array.
methods.JSONArray put(int index, Object value): Sets the value at index to value, null padding this array to the required length if necessary.
methods.JSONArray put(int index, long value): Sets the value at index to value, null padding this array to the required length if necessary.
methods.JSONArray put(int index, int value): Sets the value at index to value, null padding this array to the required length if necessary.
methods.JSONArray put(boolean value): Appends value to the end of this array.
methods.JSONArray put(int index, double value): Sets the value at index to value, null padding this array to the required length if necessary.
methods.JSONArray put(Object value): Appends value to the end of this array.
methods.Object remove(int index): Removes and returns the value at index, or null if the array has no value at index.
methods.JSONObject toJSONObject(JSONArray names): Returns a new object whose values are the values in this array, and whose names are the values in names.
methods.String toString(): Encodes this array as a compact JSON string, such as:
